timeline.message: Checkout eager do and print tags
Add error if helpers are empty

timeline.bodyText:
just as a personal preference, if inputs and expected files are short enough, I would just put them right in the code here. It's way easier to read when you don't have to flip back and forth  between files.
Someday we'll get text blocks.
timeline.author: boulter

replies.bodyText: Okay, I'll make a note to clean up the one-liners, and text blocks would be perfect here if we get them
replies.author: jasmith-hs

timeline.author: Joeoh

timeline.bodyText: Looks like this logic is the same for both tags, and maybe others? Should we split it out into a function?
timeline.author: Joeoh

replies.bodyText: Yes, that is a good call.
replies.author: jasmith-hs
